src:
Jurgen Klopp Tidak Pernah Tertarik Memikirkan Man City, Ini Penyebabnya
04 Nov 2019, 08:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Bos Liverpool, Jurgen Klopp mengaku tidak pernah tertarik memperhatikan hasil pertandingan sang rival, Manchester City. Dia mengaku hanya fokus pada pertandingan timnya sendiri yang sudah sangat penting.
Akhir pekan lalu, dua tim terkuat di Premier League ini sama-sama mewujudkan comeback impresif untuk memetik kemenangan. Liverpool mengalahkan Aston Villa 2-1, Man City meraih skor yang sama atas Southampton.
Uniknya, kedua tim tersebut sama-sama tertinggal terlebih dahulu. Man City membalik skor lewat dua gol di menit ke-70 dan ke-86, sementara Liverpool lebih dramatis, di menit ke-87 dan 90+4.
Pekan depan, dua tim kuat ini akhirnya berduel untuk membuktikan siapa yang paling kuat, Anfield mendapat kehormatan jadi wadah pertama. Bagaimana pendapat Klopp? Scroll ke bawah ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Jurgen Klopp was never interested in thinking about Man City, this is the cause
Nov 04 2019, 08:30 by Bola.net
Soccer boss Liverpool, Jurgen Klopp claimed he was never interested in paying attention to the results of his rival, Manchester City. He claimed to only focus on his own team's matches which were already very important.
Last weekend, the two strongest teams in the Premier League were both creating an impressive comeback to win. Liverpool beat Aston Villa 2-1, Man City won the same score over Southampton.
Uniquely, both teams are equally left behind first. Man City reversed the score by two goals in the 70th and 86th minutes, while Liverpool was more dramatic, in the 87th and 90 + 4 minutes.
Next week, these two strong teams finally duel to prove who is the most powerful, Anfield had the honor of being the first place. What is Klopp's opinion? Scroll down, Bolaneters!
